dynamicports.name: inputMappingScript

parameters.mapScript:
map({
	id: () => object.get('deal').id,
	title: () => object.get('deal').title,
	price: () => object.get('deal').price,
	value: () => object.get('deal').value,
	/* discount_amount: () => object.get('deal').discount_amount,
	discount_percentage: object => object.get('deal').discount_percentage,
	provider_name: () => object.get('deal').provider_name,
	category_slug: () => object.get('deal').category_slug,
	image_url: () => object.get('deal').image_url,
	url: () => object.get('deal').url,
	online: () => object.get('deal').online,
	expires_at: () => object.get('deal').expires_at */
})

parameters.Schema:
schema({
    Email: string().required('Must provide email').email('Must be valid email'),
    Username: string().required('Must provide username'),
    Password: string()
        .required('Must provide password')
        .matches(
            /^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[!@#\$%\^&\*])(?=.{8,})/,
            'Password need to be more secure!'
        ),
    ConfirmPassword: string()
        .required('Must confirm password')
        .oneOf([ref('Password')], 'Passwords must match'),
    AcceptTerms: Yup.boolean().oneOf([true], 'You must accept the terms.')
})
